title: OptiPrice — AI-Driven Smart Pricing Calculator
description: AI-powered business tool for pricing strategy optimization using market data and ML-based price recommendations.
problem: Businesses often rely on guesswork or outdated methods to set prices, leading to lost revenue, uncompetitive offers, and missed market opportunities.
solution: Developed an AI-powered pricing calculator that analyzes market data and uses ML-based algorithms to generate smart price recommendations tailored to business needs.
features: Market data integration for real-time pricing insights
Dashboard for viewing pricing trends and forecasts
architecture: JavaScript frontend integrated with AI APIs for machine learning predictions and market data analysis.
outcomes: Enabled data-driven pricing decisions
Reduced time spent on pricing strategy from hours to minutes
Improved profit margins through optimized pricing

title: CattleDoctor — ML-Based Cattle Disease Diagnosis System
description: Machine-learning powered cattle disease diagnosis with treatment recommendations via symptom input. Integrated through a Django REST API.
problem: Farmers in rural areas lack quick access to veterinary expertise, resulting in delayed diagnosis, improper treatment, and livestock loss.
solution: Built a machine-learning powered diagnosis system that takes symptom inputs and predicts cattle diseases with treatment recommendations, accessible via a web interface.
features: Symptom-based disease prediction using Random Forest ML model
Treatment recommendation engine based on diagnosed diseases
Django REST API for scalable backend integration
architecture: Django REST API backend with a Random Forest classifier trained on cattle disease data, connected to a JavaScript frontend for user interaction.
outcomes: Faster diagnosis without waiting for veterinary visits
Reduced livestock mortality through early intervention
Scalable system ready for deployment in farming communities

title: QuickFold Laundry Services Web App
description: Laundry service booking platform with order scheduling, tracking, and automated customer management.
problem: Laundry businesses struggled with manual booking, order tracking, and customer management, leading to inefficiencies and missed appointments.
solution: Created a laundry service booking platform with scheduling, real-time order tracking, and automated customer management features.
architecture: React frontend with Firebase for authentication, real-time database, and hosting. Fully serverless architecture.
outcomes: Streamlined booking process for customers
Reduced manual coordination for business owners
Improved customer satisfaction with order visibility

title: MaishaBoraNyumbani — Catering & Food School Website
description: Business site showcasing catering services, products, and training programs for a culinary school.
problem: A culinary school and catering business lacked an online presence to showcase services, attract customers, and communicate training programs.
solution: Designed and built a professional business website showcasing catering services, product offerings, and training programs for the culinary school.
features: Training program information and enrollment details
architecture: Custom frontend built with Webflow for rapid design and deployment, optimized for SEO and performance.
outcomes: Increased online visibility and brand awareness
More customer inquiries through the website
Professional digital presence established

title: House Hunter Jenny — Property Listing & Categorization Platform
description: Real estate listing app enabling agents to upload, categorize, and share property selections with clients.
problem: Real estate agents struggled to organize property listings, categorize them effectively, and share curated selections with clients efficiently.
solution: Built a property listing platform that enables agents to upload, categorize, and share property selections with clients through a clean, organized interface.
features: Property upload with images and details
architecture: React frontend with Firebase for data storage and authentication, deployed on Netlify for fast, reliable hosting.
outcomes: Efficient property management for agents
Improved client experience with organized listings
Faster property matching and sharing process

title: Broshere Financial App — Community Savings Platform
description: Digital wallet and community savings platform designed to support collective financial groups.
problem: Informal community savings groups (chamas) lacked digital tools to track contributions, manage funds, and ensure transparency among members.
solution: Developed a digital wallet and community savings platform prototype designed to support collective financial groups with transparent tracking.
features: Digital wallet for individual and group savings
architecture: Web and mobile hybrid prototype designed for cross-platform accessibility, focusing on financial inclusion for underserved communities.
outcomes: Prototype validated with target user groups
Framework established for financial inclusion tool
Ready for further development and deployment

title: EishConsult — Mental Health Consultation Website
description: Online mental health consultation platform supporting therapy booking and resource access for remote wellness services.
problem: Access to mental health services is limited for many, especially in remote areas, creating barriers to therapy and wellness support.
solution: Built an online mental health consultation platform that enables therapy booking, provides wellness resources, and supports remote consultation sessions.
architecture: Custom frontend built with Webflow, optimized for accessibility and user experience in sensitive healthcare contexts.
outcomes: Expanded access to mental health services
Convenient booking for clients and therapists
Platform ready for scaling with more practitioners
